heading: From Start To Finish
subheading: Comprehensive surveying services for every phase of your project.

services.name: Boundary & ALTA/NSPS Land Title Surveys
services.description: Comprehensive boundary surveys meeting ALTA/NSPS standards for real estate transactions, title insurance, and development.

services.name: Topographic & Existing Conditions Surveys
services.description: Detailed mapping of terrain, utilities, and site features to support engineering design and permitting.

services.name: Control Surveys (Horizontal & Vertical)
services.description: Establish geodetic control networks using GNSS and conventional methods to ensure project-wide accuracy.

services.name: Right-of-Way & Easement Surveys
services.description: Define transportation corridors, easements, and acquisition parcels for infrastructure projects.

services.name: As-Built & Record Surveys
services.description: Verify constructed improvements against design plans for compliance and closeout documentation.

services.name: ASCE 38 Utility Designation (Quality Level B)
services.description: Surface geophysical mapping of underground utilities in accordance with ASCE 38 standards.

services.name: Utility Test Hole / Potholing (Quality Level A)
services.description: Vacuum excavation to expose and verify utility depth and position.

services.name: Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR)
services.description: Subsurface imaging to detect non-conductive utilities and underground anomalies.

services.name: Electromagnetic Utility Locating
services.description: Detection of metallic and conductive utilities using active and passive EM methods.

services.name: Utility Mapping & GIS Integration
services.description: Deliver georeferenced utility data in CAD and GIS formats for engineering workflows.

services.name: Utility Conflict Analysis
services.description: Identify and document conflicts between proposed improvements and existing utilities.

services.name: Relocation Design Coordination
services.description: Coordinate with utility owners to plan relocations and minimize project impacts.

services.name: Utility Owner Liaison Services
services.description: Serve as primary communication point between project teams and utility providers.

services.name: Permit & Agreement Management
services.description: Assist with joint-use agreements, relocation agreements, and regulatory approvals.

services.name: Utility Schedule & Risk Tracking
services.description: Monitor relocation timelines and manage utility-related construction risks.

services.name: Aerial LiDAR Mapping
services.description: High-resolution airborne LiDAR data acquisition for large-area terrain modeling.

services.name: Mobile LiDAR Scanning
services.description: Vehicle-mounted LiDAR for roadway, corridor, and infrastructure documentation.

services.name: Terrestrial Laser Scanning (TLS)
services.description: Ground-based 3D scanning for structures, facilities, and complex environments.

services.name: Digital Terrain & Surface Modeling
services.description: Generate DTM and DSM deliverables from LiDAR datasets.

services.name: Point Cloud Processing & 3D Modeling
services.description: Extract features, contours, and BIM-ready models from LiDAR point clouds.

services.name: Construction Layout & Staking
services.description: Provide precise field staking for grading, utilities, foundations, and structures.

services.name: Machine Control Modeling
services.description: Develop 3D models for GPS-guided grading and heavy equipment systems.

services.name: Progress & Quantity Surveys
services.description: Track earthwork volumes and project progress through periodic surveys.

services.name: Structural & Deformation Monitoring
services.description: Monitor settlement, movement, and structural integrity during construction.

services.name: Final Certification & Closeout Surveys
services.description: Provide final grade certifications and record drawings for project completion.

services.name: Mortgage Location Surveys
services.description: Determine improvements relative to property boundaries for lending purposes.

services.name: Lot & Block Surveys
services.description: Establish property corners and lot dimensions within platted subdivisions.

services.name: Elevation Certificates
services.description: Provide FEMA-compliant elevation data for flood insurance requirements.

services.name: Site Planning Surveys
services.description: Support commercial development with existing conditions and utility mapping.

services.name: Subdivision & Platting Services
services.description: Prepare subdivision plats and coordinate approvals with local jurisdictions.
